LanguageData.DMS_NutrientPort.label: Nutrition Port
LanguageData.DMS_NutrientPort.description: A bionic that does a total overhaul of the patient's digestive system, replacing it with a fueling port and nutrient storage.
LanguageData.DMS_ProstheticArm.label: Mechaneural Arm
LanguageData.DMS_ProstheticArm.description: An advanced artificial arm. Silenced mini-servos give great strength, while the biogel nerve-link gives exquisite control. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological arm in almost every way.
LanguageData.DMS_ProstheticEye.label: Mechaneural Visual Sensor
LanguageData.DMS_ProstheticEye.description: An artificial light receiver with nerve-link, with integrated night vision and aim assist it might be better than the original one...maybe?
LanguageData.DMS_ProstheticLeg.label: Mechaneural Leg
LanguageData.DMS_ProstheticLeg.description: An advanced artificial leg. With its biogel nerve-link, powerful mini-servos, and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological leg in almost every way.
LanguageData.DMS_ProstheticSpine.label: Bio-mechanical Neurochord
LanguageData.DMS_ProstheticSpine.description: An advanced bio-mechanical spine which also works as a sub-brain to be compatible with other prostheses by sharing reflex nerves.
LanguageData.DMS_SensoryFilter.label: Sensory Filter
LanguageData.DMS_SensoryFilter.description: A signal filter which filters specific emotional feedback to deaden knee-jerk emotive responses, but will still allow some need of socio-emotional moods in order to communicate with others normally, allowing user become a perfect soldier during war. However it is still regarded as an inhuman surgical procedure nowadays and classified as a serious crime.
LanguageData.DMS_SyntheticArm.label: Biosynthetic Arm
LanguageData.DMS_SyntheticArm.description: An advanced artificial arm. Composed of synthetic muscles and plasfiber skin grown on bone made by tungsteel.
LanguageData.DMS_SyntheticLeg.label: Biosynthetic Leg
LanguageData.DMS_SyntheticLeg.description: An advanced artificial leg. With its biogel nerve-link, powerful mini-servos, and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological leg in almost every way.
